text: Need Andrew Clark for Myer campaign. Budget around $34,576, looking for 3 x Facebook post, 1 x YouTube short, 1 x 3-minute vlog, 2 x Facebook story. 8 week exclusivity from other fashion brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $34,576 budget
